org.researchstack.backbone.step

Class ConsentSignatureStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.researchstack.backbone.step.Step
      • org.researchstack.backbone.step.ConsentSignatureStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ConsentSignatureStep
extends Step
    This class represents the final step in the consent process, collecting the signature from the study participant.
    See Also:

      • ConsentSignatureStep

        public ConsentSignatureStep(java.lang.String identifier)

    • Method Detail

      • getSignatureDateFormat

        public java.lang.String getSignatureDateFormat()
        Returns the date format string to be used when producing a date string for the PDF or consent review.

        For example, "yyyy-MM-dd 'at' HH:mm". When the value of this property is null, the current date and time for the current locale is used.

        Returns:
        the date format string

      • setSignatureDateFormat

        public void setSignatureDateFormat(java.lang.String signatureDateFormat)
        Sets the date format string to be used when producing a date string for the PDF or consent review.

        For example, "yyyy-MM-dd 'at' HH:mm". When the value of this property is null, the current date and time for the current locale is used.

        Parameters:
        signatureDateFormat - a string representing the date format
